items.sentence: My elbow really hurts. I guess I should go to a hospital.
Could you call my teacher and pretend that you're my dad?
I doubt that Tom can play the violin as well as Mary can.
One of my friends is getting married in Boston next week.
I'd expected to be able finish this work, but I couldn't.
There are no more vacant lots in my neighborhood anymore.
You may stay here if you like, as long as you keep quiet.
Whenever I see you, I always think of my younger brother.
Topless beaches are more common in Europe than in the US.
I don't think that Tom knows when Mary will visit Boston.
